runs.comm: starts of with a back of length delivery on off stump, defended back to the bowler
keeps it tight on off stump, again defended back to the bowler
length ball on off, swings a touch in and the batsman just plays a beautiful on drive to power that one through midwicket, with some timing
that was not short enough for the pull, and the batsman gets beaten as it comes in to him, it just goes over the top of off on it's way to the keeper
loud no after Jamshed drops it on the off side off the front foot. Shehzad was keen, but was sent back
makes room and advances a bit down the pitch, but is able to only push it back to the bowler
bowls length on off stump, shapes in to the right hander a touch, defended back to the bowler off the front foot
gets some width outside off and he flays at that one, steering it over point for a one-bounce four. The third-man  made a diving effort to get close to that
angled across the right-hander, the batsman comes forward and shoulders arms
length ball a touch outside off stump, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to mid-off
slower ball on the off stump, the batsman stays in the crease and turns it to wide mid-on for a single
waits on the back foot and flicks this length delivery on off stump to deep backward square leg
drives the length delivery very hard towards extra cover, but Morris at mid-off makes a diving save
too straight, he goes across the line and slams this past the outstretched hands of short midwicket
he goes for the pull again, but it is not to short. He gets cramped for room and gets hit on the chest after as the ball takes a bit of inside edge
length ball on off stump, the batsman defends it towards cover
pitches it up and Shahzad smashes it back towards the bowler, Abbott did well to stay away from the ball and it goes to the boundary in no time
140 kph, short ball, and it looked like he had all the time. He pulls it handsomely over midwicket and sends this deep into the stands
length ball outside off, the batsman just goes through with his aerial shot over the bowler's head. He didn't get the timing right, the ball drops few meters before the boundary and stops
length ball outside off, it is defended towards point

caught at midwicket! He moves outside leg stump and the bowler follows him, the batsman then tries to swat it over midwicket but gets a bit cramped for room and ends up playing it straight to the hands of Ontong

oh my god, what are they upto! Two missed run out opportunities in one ball! Faf dived at point to stop a cut shot, but Shahzad ran all the way to the other end, Faf throws misses, goes to mid-on, who fires it back again, misses again. What a let off!
length ball on off stump, pushes towards mid-off off the front foot
slower ball to end the over, he bowls it on off stump and the batsman comes forward and defends
charges down the pitch to the first ball from Rory, makes it a half-volley but hits it straight to mid-on
slower delivery wide outside off, the batsman throws his bat at that but doesn't make contact. It is called a wide
short of length delivery which follows the batsman as he makes room, he tucks it towards short fine leg for a tight single as AB's throw comes in and breaks the stumps. All safe
veers it towards the pads and Hafeez gets inside the line and turns it past short fine leg for a boundary, good timing there.
slower delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
oh the extra bounce beats the bat! Rory looks back at the umpire, more in hope, but that was a good ball
another back of length delivery on off stump, the batsman stays on the back foot and drops it to the left of point for a single
starts off with a length ball, 141 kph, on off stump, it is defended back to the bowler
short ball but it is down the leg side and is called a wide
this one is not short enough, but the batsman stays in the crease and pulls it over midwicket for couple of bounces and then to the boundary
moves outside leg and tries to go inside out off a length delivery, misses and the ball just goes past the off stump
short of length, angling in from wide of crease, the batsman stays back and pulls it hard to deep square leg
oh wow!! He moves his front leg out of the way and slams a length delivery over long-off. Good hit
now he shuffles across the crease and flicks the fuller length delivery past short fine leg for boundary. Expensive start for Morris
bowls a slider outside off, the batsman goes for a cut and misses. It was not very far from the off stump
floats it up, but gives a lot of width. The batsman cuts it past point, not very hard, but just with an open face and bagful of timing
he is not going to let Peterson settle. He charges down the pitch and lofts it straight over the bowler's head. No half measures there
dabs this one to short third-man, and is rightly sent back by the non-striker
floats it up wide of off, the batsman lets it go and then looks a the umpire for a possible wide
and another one wide outside off (it might be some plan), but Hafeez beats the point fielder with his cut. Only a diving effort at the boundary saves extra runs
length ball on off, he dabs it in the gap at cover and sets off for a quick single
he was waiting for the short of length stuff, gets into position early and pulls it to deep backward square leg. Two fielders converge, slide and dive, but both miss it
slower delivery short of length outside off, the batsman tries to steer it towards third man but the ball goes past the bat
another short of length delivery and again Hafeez goes for the pull. He doesn't get a lot of timing this time, as it rolls towards deep square leg
moves outside leg stump and tennis forehands that one to deep midwicket boundary
fuller delivery on leg stump, the batsman has moved outside leg too and he punches that one to midwicket for a single
slower delivery angled across the right-hander, the batsman follows it but makes no contact as it goes through to the keeper
another slower delivery outside off, the batsman waits for it and just opens the face to run it past a diving backward point fielder
bowls length, but on off stump this time, the batsman comes forward and dabs it towards point with an open face
slower delivery on off, the batsman gets beaten as he goes for the drive and the ball just eludes the short cover fielder, that was very close.
back of length on middle-stump line, the batsman turns it towards square leg and thinks about two, but the fielder from deep charges in and keeps them to one
length ball outside off, it is driven towards wide long-on and they get back for a quick second
what power! what timing! He comes down the track and takes the ball on the full, and smashes it over extra cover
he pulls the length back and the batsman swivels to play it towards deep backward square leg, in the air, but safe
pushed towards the vacant mid-on area, the bowler runs all the way to do the fielding
moves outside leg and flatbats this one way into the crowd, towards the cow-corner. Some carnage going on here
the batsman moves outside leg and drives this very full delivery straight down to long-off
now the reverse sweep, but he doesn't quite get hold of that as it goes slowly towards short third-man. They take a single nonetheless
low full-toss, now the batsman thread the tiny gap between short fine and backward square leg. The deluge continues
slower delivery outside off, it is guided towards short third-man for a quick run
slower ball bouncer on off stump, the batsman has to wait ages for that one and then he steers it towards short third man for a single
back of length delivery is pulled hard to deep square leg, there could have been two, but Shahzad slips at the non-striker's end
oh wow, that just looked like a defensive steer towards backward point, but that beats the two fielders placed there to perfection and scoots to the boundary
attempts a yorker, but it is a low full-toss which is driven hard towards cow-corner. The fielder long-on runs around and cuts off the boundary

and there is a run-out now! The batsman went for a reverse sweep, and didn't get hold of it. It just lobbed towards short third-man but drops a foot ahead of him. By this time the batsman from non-striker end has already started charging And Shahzad is too late to set off. The throw goes to the non-striker's end where it is an easy run out
and Hafeez brings up his fifty with a little nudge towards square leg off the back foot
Umar gets a short ball on the leg stump and he goes down on his knees and swivels it past short fine for a boundary
he goes for the cut now, but the fielder at deep point has to run around to make the save. One run saved
flat, quick, short, outside leg. It just needed to be sent to the boundary and that's what Hafeez does with a ferocious pull
quicker delivery on the middle stump, it is pushed to the off side for a quick single
and another one goes past short fine. It was in the air but it was away from the fielder too. Hafeez went down on his knee even before the bowler bowled and slapped it past the fielder
back of length delivery outside off, and a rare play and a miss in the innings
back of length delivery on off, it is slower as well, pulled hard straight to the fielder at deep square leg
smartly chips it over the mid-off fielder for a couple, off a slower ball
slower delivery wide outside off and it is harshly called a wide. The bowler is not really happy with that call, nor is AB
comes down the track, but the bowler bowls another slower ball. The batsman still manages to hit it towards long-on for a single
more slower stuff from the bowler, the batsman nudges it to deep square leg for an easy single
sees the flat delivery early and move the front leg out of the way to  clobber that over cow corner, it goes deep into the stands
and a repeat of the first ball, only this time it goes higher and longer. What is he on today!! Phew, some hitting this
bowls in on off and middle, the batsman tucks it towards square leg for a single
plays it late with an open face and runs it down to short third man for a single. There is an appeal for run out but the batsman has made it comfortably with a full-length dive
and another one sent to cow-corner. He is loving it today. This one was slower and he comes down the pitch and smokes it to that area again
goes on the back foot and punches this one on the middle stump to deep cover for a single
bowls it full and wide outside off, the batsman chases it but gets beaten. Just inside the wide marker
and another one wide and full outside off, the batsman tries to go inside out over extra cover but makes no contact
hits the length ball across the line towards long-on, but doesn't get his timing behind that shot

caught at extra cover! He swats the short of length delivery outside off straight into the hands of extra cover. He could have hit that anywhere really and would feel he has missed out while everyone is enjoying themselves. Good over this one till now
short of length delivery on off stump, the batsman stays on the back foot and runs it to backward point for a single
tries to bowl that wide of off line again, but this one is too wide
slower ball outside off, the batsman gives it everything as he aims for that area around cow corner, but misses it completely.
short of length delivery on off stump, the batsman pulls it towards wide long-on for a single
ohhh! Almost another one. The batsman goes for a swat over the mid-off fielder, but gets hit high on the bat and it lobs to the left of mid-on. Just drops short
this time he drives it inside out to deep cover from a length
slower delivery short of length on off stump, Malik moves outside leg and ramps it over the backward point fielder for more runs
fuller delivery on off, the batsman tries to go downtown, but doesn't get the timing and he hits it along the ground to mid-off
bowls it wide outside off, and the batsman misses as he has moved outside leg. But it is again called a wide, harshly so
attempts a slower delivery, but it is a low full-toss outside off, it is driven hard to deep cover
length delivery on off, it is carved towards deep point and the batsmen get back quickly for the second

bowls full outside off, and the batsman somehow gets under it and slams it over covers for a boundary. He slid as he played that shot as  well. OH NO! His backfoot has slipped a long way and it has disturbed the stumps. What a horrible way to get out after such a super innings. Well played Hafeez, but Misbah holds on to the highest T20 score by a Pakistani batsman

length ball on off, he taps it back towards the bowler, comes running down the pitch, but bowler get there and throws it back at stumps, misses target and the batsman runs overthrows. Not the best way to get off the mark

caught at short third-man! And now Malik falls. He tries to steer the short of length delivery between backward point and short third man, but the ball comes slow at him and mucks up his timing as he ends up just guiding it straight to the fielder
it is on the pads, and Kamran is unable to get it away. The ball hits him and rolls towards the keeper
full delivery outside off, it is punched down to long-on for a single
length ball on the middle and leg line, it is tucked to deep midwicket off the back foot
short ball, it is quick and it goes over the shoulder and towards the leg side. Not called a wide. Strange call by the umpire
another short ball, this time it is a good one. Afridi goes for the hook shot anyway but misses it completely
he makes room by moving outside leg, but the ball is full outside off. Afridi manages to steer it to deep point

caught at deep cover! It is a slower ball outside off, the batsman has to generate his own power as he looks for a six, but it goes as far as the deep cover area. I guess it was the pressure of not scoring much in this over.
length ball, touch slower outside off, it is driven hard to long-off for a single
a slower leg cutter beats the batsman's outside edge as he comes forward to push that to cover
another slower ball, full on off stump, it is pushed to cover for a single
spots the slower ball early and clubs it with awesome power towards cow corner. Davids gets and gets a hand to it, but the momentum on the ball carries it through
this one outside off and the batsman gets a thick outside edge to third man for a single
and another slower ball, it is a leg cutter. Gul goes across the line and misses. Some anti climax this after all that hitting
slower delivery  on off, it is a low full toss and Afridi loves it. He bludgeons this over the bowler's head for a one-bounce four
bowls it full and fast on off stump, but Afridi gets and inside edge fine on the leg side. The short fine leg fielder seems to have it covered but he makes a hash of it while going for a slide
full and fast on the middle stump line, it is pushed towards long on for a single

caught at deep midwicket! And they keep finding the fielders in the deep. It was a slower ball outside off, Gul goes across the line but top-edges that one. It goes miles in the air but doesn't get much distance. The fielder from deep midwicket runs around and takes it comfortably
he goes for the sweep, Afridi, and it goes between the keeper and the short fine leg fielder for another boundary
can he get the last ball out of the ground, no he can't. The yorker is dug out towards mid-off and it's just a single
